>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/users/me/limits"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



<span class="openapi-clients-box"></span><span id="/reference/users/account-and-usage-limits/get-limits"></span><span id="/reference/users/get-limits"></span>Returns a complete summary of your account's limits. It is the same
information you will see on your account's [Limits page](https://console.apify.com/billing#/limits). The returned data
includes the current usage cycle, a summary of your limits, and your current usage.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
